title: STEM Visual Storytelling Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency (experience with smartphone-based apps)
context.additional_context: For working adult learners, requiring flexible participation outside work hours, emphasizing learning material creation and sharing via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can design creative projects that express STEM concepts through visual storytelling.
Learners can produce content that visually communicates STEM-related ideas using mobile devices.
Learners can improve visual storytelling works at least twice based on peer feedback.

resources: Smartphone-Based Image/Video Editing Apps (e.g., Canva, CapCut)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
